description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Be quick or be dead! Featuring 10 outlaws in 10 unique game modes, 2 player versus, and more. Challenge your friends to see who has the quickest draw, or play arcade mode and try to get the highest score!
description.short: Be quick or be dead! Featuring 10 outlaws in 10 unique game modes, 2 player versus, and more. Challenge your friends to see who has the quickest draw, or play arcade mode and try to get the highest score!
